resources.string: Did everyone find the right card ?
You need at least 3 players to play Dixit !
Please provide a number in the box :)

What you need to play : Dixit cards, and players 😉 
 
 How to play :
 
 	• Select the players in the app, then choose the number of points to win.
 	• Give five cards to each player.
 	• For the first turn, the first player that has an idea is the storyteller.
 	• Choose his name in the app.
 	• The storyteller chooses a card in his hand and says a (or some) word(s) in relation to this card, he puts the card in the middle (hidden).
 	• Each player then selects a card in his hand matching what the storyteller said and puts it in the middle.
 	• When every player has selected a card, the storyteller collects them all and shuffles them. Then he puts them on the table (artwork visible).
 	• Players now need to find the card of the storyteller, everyone should keep quiet in order to not influence others.
 	• When a player has made his choice, he raises his finger, meaning his decision is made.
 	• When all the fingers are raised, the storytelles counts down from 3 to 1, and then everyone points at his elected card.
 	• In the app, enter the choice of every player.
 	• Scores are automatically updated using these rules :
 		• If no-one or everyone has found, the storyteller has 0 points and the players have 2 points.
 		• If at least one player has found the card of the storyteller, the storyteller and the players who found have 3 points.
 		• 1 additional point is granted at a player for each people who has voted for his card.
 	• Then, the turn is over, and the players are sorted according to their scores.
 	• When a turn is over, the new storyteller is the player at the left of the former storyteller, everyone draws a new card and a new turn begins.
 	• The winner is the first player to reach the number of points to win, in case of draw, the game continues.
 🎉 🎉 Have fun !! 🎉 🎉 
 
 P.S.: Thanks for downloading the app, don't forget to rate it and post some update suggestions in the Play Store ;)
